resources.string: You have not created any trip yet. To do so, click in the \\\"+\\\" icon
You have not created any layer for your trip yet. You can easily divide your places. To do so, click in the \"+\" icon and then you can add places from the map
If you delete the trip, you will be deleting all the categories and places
If you delete the category you will remove all the places
Welcome Traveler! What do you want to do today?
It won\'t be seen on map if you delete it
Create at least one category before searching for any places to add
"The selected category is hidden. To see the new place on map, enable it on previous screen. "
You must fill all fields to continue
From date cannot be after To date
You already created a category with that name
Please enable GPS access to continue
